titleStmt.title: To the Right Honorable Will: Lenthal Speaker to the Parliament By him to be communicated to the Members sitting at Westminster.
titleStmt.author: Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Thomas at the Adam and Eve in Little Brittain,

notesStmt.note: An address from the county of Berks, praying for a Free Parliament and the recall of the Members secluded in 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
